title: How is it fair
body:
That I win a ranked game, gain 18lp. Lose a ranked game lose 21 lp

I Don't get it.

replies.body: Depends on the team average and matchmaking contentiously adjusting based on your skill level.  If matchmaking believes that your team is going to lose, you get more points if you end up winning.  On the other hand, you would lose more points if matchmaking thought your team would win.  Our [ranked play guide](https://support.riotgames.com/hc/en-us/articles/204010760-Ranked-Play-FAQ) has more info as well, but be sure to hit up the [Gameplay boards](https://boards.na.leagueoflegends.com/en/c/gameplay-balance) if you have any questions or concerns.
